languages.text: Кровь тех, чье имя прошептал Неумирающий, дарует Его слугам твердость тела и духа. Этот перстень — воплощение данной догмы.
The blood of those whose names the Undying Emperor has whispered strengthens His servant's body and spirit. This ring embodies that dogma.
languages.original_text: Кровь тех, чье имя прошептал Неумирающий, дарует Его слугам твердость тела и духа. Этот перстень — воплощение данной догмы.

traits.locale_text: The blood of those whose name the Undying Emperor has whispered strengthens His servant's body and spirit. This ring embodies this dogma.

The blood of those whose names the Undying Emperor has whispered strengthens His servant's body and spirit. This ring embodies that dogma.

languages.text: Das Blut all jener, deren Namen der todlose Imperator geflüstert hat, stärkt Leib und Geist Seines Dieners. Dieser Ring verkörpert dieses Dogma.
languages.original_text: The blood of those whose names the Undying Emperor has whispered strengthens His servant's body and spirit. This ring embodies that dogma.

traits.locale_text: Das Blut all jener, deren Namen der todlose Imperator geflüstert hat, stärkt Leib und Geist Seines Dieners. Dieser Ring verkörpert dieses Dogma.

languages.text: Le sang de ceux dont l'Empereur Immortel a murmuré le nom renforce le corps et l'esprit de Ses serviteurs. Cet anneau est le symbole de ce dogme.
languages.original_text: The blood of those whose names the Undying Emperor has whispered strengthens His servant's body and spirit. This ring embodies that dogma.

traits.locale_text: Le sang de ceux dont l'Empereur Immortel a murmuré le nom renforce le corps et l'esprit de Ses serviteurs. Cet anneau est le symbole de ce dogme.

languages.text: La sangre de aquellos cuyos nombres ha susurrado el Emperador Inmortal refuerza el cuerpo y el espíritu de Su sirviente. Este anillo representa ese dogma.
languages.original_text: The blood of those whose names the Undying Emperor has whispered strengthens His servant's body and spirit. This ring embodies that dogma.

traits.locale_text: La sangre de aquellos cuyos nombres ha susurrado el Emperador Inmortal refuerza el cuerpo y el espíritu de Su sirviente. Este anillo representa ese dogma.

languages.text: 「不死の皇帝がその名を囁いた者たちの血が、主の従者の肉体と精神を強化する。この指輪は、その教義を体現していた」
languages.original_text: The blood of those whose names the Undying Emperor has whispered strengthens His servant's body and spirit. This ring embodies that dogma.

traits.locale_text: 「不死の皇帝がその名を囁いた者たちの血が、主の従者の肉体と精神を強化する。この指輪は、その教義を体現していた」

languages.text: 被不死神皇呼唤之人的鲜血可以强化神皇忠仆的肉体与精神，这枚戒指便代表着这个信条。
languages.original_text: The blood of those whose names the Undying Emperor has whispered strengthens His servant's body and spirit. This ring embodies that dogma.

traits.locale_text: 被不死神皇呼唤之人的鲜血可以强化神皇忠仆的肉体与精神，这枚戒指便代表着这个信条。

languages.text: Ölmeyen İmparator'un fısıldadığı isimlerin damarlarından akan kan, hizmetkârının hem bedenini hem de ruhunu kuvvetlendirir. Bu yüzük, bahsi geçen dogmanın cisimleşmiş hâlidir.
languages.original_text: The blood of those whose names the Undying Emperor has whispered strengthens His servant's body and spirit. This ring embodies that dogma.
